contest-event.event-date:
March 24, 1913 D Abergavenny Contest
Abergavenny Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Abergavenny Contest abergavenny-contest
Lohengrin [arr. Round]
Abergavenny, Monmouthshire, Wales, UK Prizes - 1st £30 and shield, 2nd £15, 3rd £6, 4th £4. 4 bands competed.
Sept. 29, 2018, 5:24 p.m. Sept. 29, 2018, 8:20 p.m.
1 Perfection Soap Works William Halliwell
2 Fodens Band William Halliwell
3 3rd Battalion Monmouth Herbert Bennett
4 Windsor Colliery Workmen's Silver Samuel Radcliffe
